belongs_to_collection.name: シリーズ・横溝正史短編集

original_title: 金田一耕助、戸惑う 蝙蝠と蛞蝓
overview: The Series, Yokomizo Seishi Short Stories is an NHK BS Premiere television drama series. It is based entirely on Yokomizo Seishi's mystery novels. In principle, the series is based on short stories, but some of the longer stories have been abridged and adapted into short stories.The first three series were broadcast in November 2016, and nine films from three series were broadcast by February 2022.
title: 金田一耕助、戸惑う 蝙蝠と蛞蝓
